mapper.select:
select smr.id,smr.create_date,sm.name,su.actual_name as create_name,smr.type,smr.num from sys_material_record as smr,sys_material as sm,sys_user as su
smr.material_id = sm.id and smr.create_id = su.id
and sm.name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
and smr.type = #{type}
order by smr.create_date desc
mapper.insert: insert into sys_material_record( material_id, type, num, create_id, create_date )values ( #{materialId}, #{type}, #{num}, #{createId}, #{createDate} )
